statements: SELECT username, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 'd2e3645e-e5ab-4dc6-9aaa-3853d606df1b';
SELECT username, transaction_history FROM user_accounts WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(transaction_history) > 0;
SELECT user_id, username, account_balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC, username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'J%' AND account_balance < 5000
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY account_balance ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, transaction_history FROM user_accounts WHERE transaction_history ->> 'type' = 'credit'
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE transaction_history @> '[{"type": "credit"}]'
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, account_balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM user_accounts JOIN transaction_history ON user_accounts.user_id = transaction_history.user_id WHERE user_accounts.account_balance < 0
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_date) AS latest_transaction FROM transaction_history GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY latest_transaction DESC
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, account_balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance <= 500 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 5000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE '%John%' OR username LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT u.username, th.amount, th.transaction_date FROM user_accounts u JOIN transaction_history th ON u.user_id = th.user_id WHERE th.amount > 500 ORDER BY th.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, as.security_question FROM user_accounts u LEFT JOIN account_security as ON u.user_id = as.user_id WHERE as.security_answer = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, account_balance FROM users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM account_details WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, account_balance FROM users ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_type, th.transaction_amount, u.username FROM transaction_history th JOIN users u ON th.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT ad.full_name, ad.email, u.username FROM account_details ad JOIN users u ON ad.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ad.phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE account_balance > 0;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, MAX(account_balance) AS max_balance FROM users GROUP BY user_id HAVING max_balance > 5000;
SELECT users.username, payments.amount FROM users INNER JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(logs.log_id) AS log_count FROM users LEFT JOIN logs ON users.user_id = logs.user_id GROUP BY users.username ORDER BY log_count DESC;
